conversations.content: Please reschedule my Dental check-up to 2024-05-20 at 10:00.

<function_thought>
To reschedule the dental check-up, I first need to search for the current calendar events that may contain the dental appointment. Once I find the relevant event, I can proceed to reschedule it to the new date and time. 
</function_thought>

<function_call>[search_calendar_events(query="Dental check-up")]</function_call>

<function_thought>
I found the dental check-up scheduled for 2024-05-18 from 09:00 to 10:00. I will now proceed to reschedule this appointment to the requested new date of 2024-05-20 at 10:00.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[reschedule_calendar_event(event_id="5", new_start_time="2024-05-20 10:00", new_end_time=None)]</function_call>
